bug.question: I have six legs and I love to march. I often carry crumbs. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I'm a very hard worker
🏠 I live in a colony
🍬 I'm attracted to sugary things

bug.question: I have colorful wings and love to sip nectar from flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I start as a caterpillar
🦋 I go through a metamorphosis
🌺 I'm often seen in gardens

bug.question: I make honey and live in a hive. I have a stinger. What am I?

hints.text: 🍯 I create a sweet treat
🌼 I pollinate flowers
👑 I live with a queen

bug.question: I am a small, round beetle with spots. People say I bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am red with black spots usually
🍀 I am considered good luck
🍎 Gardeners love me because I eat aphids

bug.question: I hop around in grassy fields and make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I am green and camouflaged.
🎶 I use my legs to make music
🦗 Some cultures eat me as a snack

bug.question: I glow in the dark and fly around at night. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I have a light inside me.
✨ I'm also called a lightning bug.
🌙 You can see me during summer nights

bug.question: I build a sticky web to catch my food. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I have eight legs.
🕷️ I'm not an insect
🪰 I trap flies and other insects

bug.question: I look like a stick, and I can hide very well in trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I blend in with branches.
🍂 I am very thin and long.
🌳 I eat leaves

bug.question: I am a bug that can jump very far and I am known for eating crops. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I am known for destroying crops
🦵 I have very powerful legs
🌍 Swarms of me can cause famines

bug.question: I live underground and build large mounds. I can damage buildings with my tunnels. What am I?

hints.text: 🏘️ I can cause damage to wooden structures
🪵 I eat wood
🐜 I am related to ants, but I eat wood

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly. I carry my house on my back. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I always carry my home.
🐌 I am a very slow animal.
🛡️ My home protects me.

ocean.question: I am a large mammal that lives in the ocean. I breathe air and can sing songs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am one of the biggest animals on Earth.
🗣️ I communicate with sounds.
🌬️ I come to the surface to breathe.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish with stripes. People like to keep me in tanks. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I am small and pretty.
🦓 I have stripes like a zebra, but I live in the water.
🏡 Some people keep me as a pet.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. I can change color to hide. What am I?

hints.text: 🖐️ I have many arms, but no legs.
🎨 I'm a master of disguise.
🌊 I live deep in the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a big fish with sharp teeth. People are often scared of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a predator.
🦷 I have many sharp teeth.
🌊 I can be found in almost every ocean.

ocean.question: I am a spiky sea creature that comes in many different colors. I am round and have no face. What am I?

hints.text: ⚽ I am usually round.
🌵 I have many spikes.
🌈 I can be different colors, such as purple, red, and black.

ocean.question: I am a very long and thin fish that hides in the sand. I can shock you if you step on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 Some people mistake me for a snake.
⚡ I can give you a jolt.
🏖️ I hide in the sand at the bottom of the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a tiny animal that makes a hard shell around myself. Many of us together create reefs. What am I?

hints.text: 🏘️ I live in a colony.
🧱 I help build something big.
🐚 My shell is very hard.

ocean.question: I am a large, flat fish that lives on the ocean floor. Both of my eyes are on the same side of my body. What am I?

hints.text: 👁️ My eyes are in a strange place.
🥞 I am shaped like a pancake.
🏜️ I blend in with the bottom of the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a deep-sea fish with a light on my head. I use my light to attract prey. What am I?

hints.text: 🔦 I have my own built-in flashlight.
👹 I look a bit scary.
🌌 I live very deep where it is always dark.
